statements: SELECT * FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, distributor_name, distribution_date FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, distributor_name FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE distribution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM GMO_Distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, distributor_name, distribution_date FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY distribution_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE product_name LIKE '%GMO%' OR distributor_name LIKE '%Organic%'
SELECT product_name, distributor_name FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, distributor_name, distribution_date FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND distributor_name = 'FreshFoods Inc.'
SELECT product_id, product_name, distribution_date FROM GMO_Distribution WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM gmo_products;
SELECT product_name, distributor_name FROM gmo_products WHERE distribution_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT product_name, distributor_name FROM gmo_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_regulations WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM compliance_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM gmo_products WHERE distributor_name = 'ABC Distributors';
SELECT product_name, distributor_name FROM gmo_products WHERE distribution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, distributor_name, distribution_date FROM gmo_products WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY distributor_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, jurisdiction FROM compliance_regulations WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM gmo_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%GMO%' AND distributor_name <> 'XYZ Distributors';
SELECT name, location FROM GMO_Distributors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GMO_Products WHERE product_type = 'Genetically Modified Seeds';
SELECT registration_date, contact_person FROM GMO_Distributors WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM GMO_Products WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_text, enforcement_date FROM GMO_Regulations WHERE enforcement_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM GMO_Distributors
SELECT id, name, location FROM GMO_Distributors ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT product_name, product_type, production_date FROM GMO_Products WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT distributor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM GMO_Products GROUP BY distributor_id HAVING total_products > 5
SELECT * FROM GMO_Regulations WHERE regulation_text LIKE '%safety%'
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers;
SELECT center_id, center_name, location FROM distribution_centers WHERE manager_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE is_gmo = true;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, center_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers WHERE center_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE is_gmo = false;
SELECT center_name, location FROM distribution_centers WHERE manager_id = 5;
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, center_id FROM shipments ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, region FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, category FROM Product WHERE is_gmo = FALSE;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Distributor ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT violation_type, description FROM Violation WHERE violation_type = 'Major' ORDER BY description ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.name, c.compliance_status, i.inspector FROM Product p INNER JOIN Compliance c ON p.id = c.product_id INNER JOIN Inspection i ON c.id = i.compliance_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT v.violation_type, v.description, i.inspector FROM Violation v INNER JOIN Inspection i ON v.inspection_id = i.id WHERE i.inspector LIKE '%John%';

SELECT p.name, COUNT(*) as violation_count FROM Product p INNER JOIN Compliance c ON p.id = c.product_id INNER JOIN Inspection i ON c.id = i.compliance_id INNER JOIN Violation v ON i.id = v.inspection_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING violation_count > 0;
SELECT d.name as distributor, COUNT(DISTINCT c.product_id) as total_products FROM Distributor d INNER JOIN Compliance c ON d.id = c.distributor_id GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
